name: INFECTIOUS - Viral Pursuit
description:
You are a mutated cell in the blood stream of patient zero. You carry the DNA that can help other cells adapt to resist the virus, but you must be careful to sequence the transfers correctly...

NOTE: You can also use WASD to move although it's not mentioned in-game. 

(Please spend a moment in the provided tutorial area before playing the main game)

This game, including all assets and music were made in 48 hours for the JimJam#2 (GameDevUnderground). Thank you for playing my first release.

Tools used:
Game Maker Studio 2
Blender
Illustrator
Photoshop
Ableton Live + VSTs
